entry.title: Four Modern Birthday Shirt Kids Tee
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Kids Tees
Price: 26.00

"Four"

Happy birthday, little one!

This super-soft tee for birthday tots was designed with love and screen printed by hand in-house. All artwork is original and printed in crisp white ink on a super soft tri-blend tee in mauve pink or olive green. This shirt is so cute and comfy, they'll want to wear it on their birthday - and beyond.

entry.title: Wooden Alphabet Flash Cards • Uppercase Letters on Sturdy Wood Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 80.00 - 90.00 (2 variants)

Learning at home should seamlessly blend form and function, beauty and practicality. Our handmade wooden alphabet cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a phonics resource, or for tracing with little fingers! Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, these engraved cards allow children to trace their fingers over the engraved letterforms while absorbing their shape. All 26 letters of the alphabet, A-Z, are included and pictured in a large, modern, easy-to-read font.

Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and make for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education. Purchase 26 flash cards alone; or purchase the 26 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference letters at various times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 5.75" wide by nearly 2" tall and approximately 1.5" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your cards. Purchase other flash card designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your displays as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Large wooden alphabet board and lowercase flash cards are not included but are available for purchase separately!

entry.title: Wooden Continent Flash Cards • Maps of All 7 Continents on Wood
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 30.00 - 38.00 (2 variants)

Our handmade wooden continent cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a resource for memorization, or for plotting their next adventure! Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, this engraved map allows children to trace their fingers over the engraved continent shapes and names while absorbing the beauty of our world's landforms. Each of the 7 continents is pictured and labeled accordingly in a modern, sans serif easy-to-read font.

Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and make for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education and geographical curiosity. Purchase the flash cards alone; or purchase the 7 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference your continents at all times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 5.75" wide by nearly 2" tall and approximately 1.5" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your cards. Purchase other flash card designs in our shop and seamlessly switch out your displays as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Large wooden world map is included but is available for purchase separately!

entry.title: Wooden Shapes Flash Cards • Set of 18 Geometric Wood Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: General Wood Product
Price: 60.00 - 70.00 (2 variants)

Our handmade wooden shape cards are designed with multiple uses in mind - as tabletop references, a piece of art in a playroom or homeschool environment, a math resource, or for tracing with little fingers!

Inspired by Montessori-style natural materials and the concept of sandpaper letters, these engraved cards allow children to trace their fingers over the engraved shapes and forms while absorbing their angles, sides, and points. Features 18 different shapes and their names below in a large, modern, easy-to-read font.

SHAPES INCLUDED:

• Circle
• Triangle
• Square
• Rectangle
• Diamond
• Oval
• Rhombus
• Trapezoid
• Pentagon
• Hexagon
• Heptagon
• Octagon
• Star
• Heart
• Cross
• Crescent
• Arrow
• Semicircle

Each wooden card measures 4" wide by 6" tall and 0.2" thick, and makes for a lovely collection in the school room. Durable materials mean that these flash cards will last through many years of home education. Purchase 18 shape flash cards alone; or purchase the 18 cards & coordinating wooden stand together for an easy way to display and reference different shapes at various times, and move around the house as needed for a beautiful and accessible reference.

Wooden stand measures 5.75" wide by nearly 2" tall and approximately 1.5" deep with a perfectly angled groove for holding your cards. Purchase other flash card designs (alphabet, continents) in our shop and seamlessly switch out your displays as needed!

Each item is lovingly designed and crafted by hand in our Ohio studio from locally sourced wood. Sealed with food-grade mineral oil and safe for babies and children to enjoy. Our line of modern learning resources are a lovely addition to a nursery, playroom, or homeschool environment and are sure to be treasured for years to come.

Full sized shapes board shown in some photos is not included but is available for purchase separately.

entry.title: Custom Name Wooden Interlocking Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gladfolk
Type: Custom charge per letter
Price: 6.00 - 50.00 (30 variants)

Let children familiarize themselves with the letters and order of their name with our customizable wooden letter puzzle! Inspired by Montessori movable alphabets, we created this one-of-a-kind heirloom-quality personalized puzzle for children to use in a variety of open-ended ways and enjoy for years on end. Inspired by Montessori materials and sandpaper numbers, we created this tactile, durable game to make learning and literacy a little more fun and a whole lot more beautiful.

Made of solid maple wood, these lightweight wooden puzzle pieces are made of durable, natural materials and are easy for little ones to grasp, trace, feel, and explore as they learn and play. Intentionally designed in a modern, child-friendly font for easy legibility. This puzzle set comes with as many pieces as you need to spell whichever name, word, or phrase you wish!

We offer personalized orders featuring uppercase letters or digits 0-9. Please leave your personalization request at checkout EXACTLY as you'd like it to read, as we will design accordingly (if multiple words are needed, please indicate). Select your puzzle piece quantity through the dropdown menu at checkout! Your wooden letter set comes in a lovely cloth drawstring bag for safekeeping and sustainable, eco-friendly storage.

Use your custom wooden letters to:

• Identify individual letters and their sounds
• Practice assembling letters in the right order to form names and meaningful words or phrases

Each name puzzle is designed with love and made by hand in our Ohio workshop from locally sourced lumber. Sealed with organic food-grade mineral oil and safe for children of all ages to enjoy. These modern letters are a lovely addition to a nursery, homeschool environment, or as a memorable heirloom quality gift to be enjoyed by little hands for many years.
